channel.title: CVE Feed for Benoit Mercusot -- Simple Popup Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Benoit Mercusot -- Simple Popup Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-34797|2024-06-05T20:42:37.209Z -- benoit%20mercusot -- simple%20popup%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Benoit Mercusot Simple Popup Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Popup Manager: from n/a through 1.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-34797|2024-06-03T10:33:28.107Z -- benoit%20mercusot -- simple%20popup%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Benoit Mercusot Simple Popup Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Popup Manager: from n/a through 1.3.5.
